alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kendall, northwestern Bexar and west central Comal Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kreutzberg, or 8 miles northeast of Boerne, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boerne, Fair Oaks Ranch, Bulverde, Cross Mountain, Walnut Grove, Guadalupe River State Park, Kendalia, Leon Springs, Kreutzberg, Welfare, Nelson City, Bergheim, Sisterdale, Timberwood Park, Government Canyon State Natural Area, San Geronimo, Cascade Caverns, Anhalt, Specht Store and Crown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
